**Usage:**

> ##lightblue|@@[[include :scp-wiki:component:parawatch-forum-post@@##
> ##lightblue|@@    color@@##=##lightgreen|color name or #rrggbb here## |
> ##lightblue|@@    username@@##=##lightgreen|account name of person## | â† prefix with "ðŸ—¿ " if a moderator
> ##lightblue|@@    date@@##=##lightgreen|MM/DD/YY (DOW) HH:MM:SS## | â† DOW is day of week, first three letters
> ##lightblue|@@    postno@@##=##lightgreen|8digitnumber## | â† should increase with time of creation
> ##lightblue|@@    depth@@##=##lightgreen|0/1/2/3/4...## | â† how many layers deep this post is
> ##lightblue|@@    content@@##=##lightgreen|The actual forum post content goes here.## â† if it spans across multiple lines, each must end with a space
> ##lightblue|@@]]@@##

= (produces)

[[include component:parawatch-forum-post
    color=red |
    username=account name of person |
    date=MM/DD/YY (DOW) HH:MM:SS |
    postno=8digitnumber |
    depth=0 |
    content=The actual forum post content goes here.
]]
